channel.title: Valentine on Tinu Alikor
channel.description: Recent content in Valentine on Tinu Alikor

item.title: Happy Valentines Day
item.description: Yesterday I found out the hard way that the Swiss don’t do Valentines Day. I walked around a local shopping centre with the kids (first time in months) hoping to purchase a card, and not a fluffy teddy or heart shaped balloon in sight. Strange? Refreshing? I’m not entirely sure how I feel about that. I don’t care enough about Valentines Day to really have an opinion. Maybe that in itself speaks volumes….
